name: Gambling Runner
description:
Gambling Runner is made for Mix and Game Jam (2020)

Gamble your speed!

In Gambling Runner the goal is to get to the end of the level as fast as you can!

Two Genres are Gambling and Platformer
Post your shortest time in the comments!

A/D - Move Left and Right

W/SpaceBar - Jump

S - Crouch

ArrowKey Up - Raise Bet

ArrowKey Down - Lower Bet

Enter - Confirm Bet

RightShift - Max Bet

BackSpace - Lowest Bet

At the moment you will lose more times than win at the gambling aspect of the game. Or I am just very unlucky.
